item.title: Beogram 4002 Type 5513: Fit and Finish Rework
item.description:
Restoring Beogram 4002 turntables is a fulfilling endeavor, though it often necessitates revisiting steps multiple times. Despite getting this particular Beogram functioning properly, I was dissatisfied with the fit of some components. The tonearm cover wasn’t sitting flush, as evidenced by its crooked appearance in the photo, with the center divider visibly off-center between the fixed arm and tonearm. A head-on perspective further highlights this issue, along with the misaligned deck trim, showing an undesirably wide gap between the panels...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-fit-and-finish-rework/
